title: Combat Music Collection
description: A collection of high quality cinematic game music for use in adventure and combat themed games.
longDescription:
Preview: soundcloud.com/john_french/sets/the-combat-colle

The Combat Collection is a high quality cinematic game music pack for use in adventure and combat themed games. The tracks include epic battle tracks, frantic pursuits, brooding ambient loops and ethnic rhythms.

Features:
• 21 Professionally produced tracks and loops
• Perfect, seamless loops
• Unique instruments
• Epic title themes
• Level up and death cues
• Quest objectives and waypoint SFX
• Loop end/start segments
• 3 bonus tracks

Tracks include:
• (5) ambient tracks
• (5) Big Battles
• (2) Close Combat
• (3) Espionage
• (4) Main themes
• (2) Pursuits
• (18) quest / short cues & SFX

The Combat Music Collection is also available in the Ultimate Game Music Collection, please note some track names may differ.
technicalDetails:

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
